statements: UPDATE in_game_inventory SET quantity = 10 WHERE player_id = 123

UPDATE in_game_inventory SET quantity = quantity + 5 WHERE player_id = 123 AND item_id = 456
UPDATE in_game_inventory SET item_name = 'Sword' WHERE player_name = 'Alice' AND quantity >= 10
